org.taverna.server.master.worker

Class RunFactoryConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.taverna.server.master.worker.RunFactoryConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurableRunFactory, RunFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRemoteRunFactory

    @ManagedResource(objectName="Taverna:group=Server-2.5.4,name=Factory",
                 description="The factory for runs.")
public abstract class RunFactoryConfiguration
extends Object
implements ConfigurableRunFactory
